original_text:
“Yet it was I who destroyed the Amorite before them,
    whose height was like the height of the cedars
    and who was as strong as the oaks;
I destroyed his fruit above
    and his roots beneath.
korean_text: 내가 아모리 사람을 그들 앞에서 멸하였나니 그 키는 백향목 높이와 같고 강하기는 상수리나무 같으나 내가 그 위의 열매와 그 아래의 뿌리를 진멸하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Yet it was I who destroyed the Amorite before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 그들 앞에서 아모리 족속을 멸망시켰다

sentences.original_text: whose height was like the height of the cedars
and who was as strong as the oaks

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그의 위에 있는 열매를 멸하였고
그 아래에 있는 그의 뿌리도 멸하였다
